title: Area of region bounded by a sine curve and a line

content.question: What is the area of the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>sin</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> and <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </math>?

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using Æ’'(x), y', and dy/dx).
